reactable: Interactive Data Tables Based on 'React Table'

Source: R/reactable.R
reactable-package.Rd

Interactive data tables for R, based on the 'React Table' JavaScript library. Provides an HTML widget that can be used in 'R Markdown' documents and 'Shiny' applications, or viewed from an R console.

Details

See the online documentation for examples and an extensive usage guide.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://glin.github.io/reactable/

  • https://github.com/glin/reactable

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/glin/reactable/issues
